mapper.select: select a.*,b.sp_name as clspNamexm,c.sp_name as clspNamegs from company_material_in_cl a left join sourcing_purchasing as b on a.cl_prj_supplier=b.sp_id left join sourcing_purchasing as c on a.cl_gs_supplier=c.sp_id where gs_in_id=#{id}
select a.*,b.demand_project from company_material_in_cl a LEFT JOIN company_material_in b on a.gs_in_id=b.cm_id where gs_in_id=(SELECT cm_id from company_material_in WHERE task_no=#{no})
mapper.update: update company_material_in_cl set cl_remain=#{remain} where cl_id=#{id}
update company_material_in_cl set cl_remain=#{cmoNumber}+cl_remain where cl_id=#{crId}
